function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Conducting surveys with 298 participants during a pandemic may increase the risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Potential for spread of contagious diseases among survey participants and their contacts.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene and safety protocols during survey data collection. Encourage virtual or contactless survey methods.","Technologies":"Use of online survey platforms, contactless data collection tools, and virtual communication technologies.","People":"Survey participants, researchers, and their contacts.","Owner":"Researchers, survey administrators, and public health authorities."},{"Description":"Mandatory in-person data collection for section B of the survey increases the risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Potential for spread of contagious diseases among survey participants during mandatory data collection.","Mitigation":"Provide alternative virtual or contactless options for section B data collection. Ensure strict hygiene and safety protocols if in-person collection is unavoidable.","Technologies":"Online survey platforms, contactless data collection tools, virtual communication technologies.","People":"Survey participants, researchers, and data collectors.","Owner":"Researchers, survey administrators."},{"Description":"Use of F test and statistical analysis may not account for the impact of the pandemic on survey responses.","Impact":"Risk of obtaining biased or inaccurate results due to the pandemic's influence on participants' responses.","Mitigation":"Consider the pandemic context in the interpretation of survey results. Use additional qualitative methods to capture the nuanced impact of the pandemic on participant responses.","Technologies":"Qualitative research methods, contextual analysis tools.","People":"Researchers, data analysts.","Owner":"Research team, data analysis team."}]}
